mapper.sql: SELECT U.HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, U.PBLANC_NO, U.HOUSE_NM, U.HOUSE_SECD, U.HOUSE_SECD_NM, u.house_dtl_secd, u.house_dtl_secd_nm, u.search_house_secd, U.HSSPLY_ZIP, U.TOT_SUPLY_HSHLDCO, U.RCRIT_PBLANC_DE, U.SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_BGNDE, U.SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_ENDDE, U.PRZWNER_PRESNATN_DE, U.CNTRCT_CNCLS_BGNDE, U.CNTRCT_CNCLS_ENDDE, U.HMPG_ADRES, U.BSNS_MBY_NM, U.MDHS_TELNO, U.MVN_PREARNGE_YM, U.HSSPLY_ADRES, U.LOCAL_NM FROM URBTYOFCTLLTTOTPBLANCDETAIL U
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO URBTYOFCTLLTTOTPBLANCDETAIL( HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, PBLANC_NO, HOUSE_NM, HOUSE_SECD, HOUSE_SECD_NM, HOUSE_DTL_SECD, HOUSE_DTL_SECD_NM, SEARCH_HOUSE_SECD, HSSPLY_ZIP, TOT_SUPLY_HSHLDCO, RCRIT_PBLANC_DE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_BGNDE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_ENDDE, PRZWNER_PRESNATN_DE, CNTRCT_CNCLS_BGNDE, CNTRCT_CNCLS_ENDDE, HMPG_ADRES, BSNS_MBY_NM, MDHS_TELNO, MVN_PREARNGE_YM, HSSPLY_ADRES ) VALUES(#{house_manage_no}, #{pblanc_no}, #{house_nm}, #{house_secd}, #{house_secd_nm}, #{house_dtl_secd}, #{house_dtl_secd_nm}, #{search_house_secd}, #{hssply_zip}, #{tot_suply_hshldco}, #{rcrit_pblanc_de}, #{subscrpt_rcept_bgnde}, #{subscrpt_rcept_endde}, #{przwner_presnatn_de}, #{cntrct_cncls_bgnde}, #{cntrct_cncls_endde}, #{hmpg_adres}, #{bsns_mby_nm}, #{mdhs_telno}, #{mvn_prearnge_ym}, #{hssply_adres})

INSERT INTO URBTYMDL( HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, PBLANC_NO, MODEL_NO, GP, TP, EXCLUSE_AR, SUPLY_HSHLDCO, SUPLY_AMOUNT, SUBSCRPT_REQST_AMOUNT ) VALUES (#{house_manage_no}, #{pblanc_no}, #{model_no}, #{gp}, #{tp}, #{excluse_ar}, #{suply_hshldco}, #{suply_amount}, #{subscrpt_reqst_amount})
